overview: From director Zander comes Vouyer Media's Mamasans Knock You Out, the all-new Asian fusion series that blows the lid off the sex lives of the finest 'mature' ladies of the East by pairing them up with some of the adult industry's most reliable studs. The result is an intense hybrid of the Asian and cougar genres that's skillfully shot for maximum erotic impact by one of today's hottest new gonzo talents
title: Mamasans Knock You Out
